did.unittitle: Jerome Nashorn "The Evolution of the Collective Bargaining Agreements of the NYC Printers" Manuscript
did.abstract: "The Evolution of the Collective Bargaining Agreements of the New York City Printers," written by Jerome Nashorn in January 1965.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183> kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of "The Evolution of the Collective Bargaining Agreements of the New York City Printers," a paper written by Jerome Nashorn in January 1965 for the course ILR 200.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Jerome Nashorn "The Evolution of the Collective Bargaining Agreements of the NYC Printers" Manuscript #/4000m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Evolution of the Collective Bargaining Agreements of the New York City Printers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Jerome Nashorn for ILR 200, January 1965; 18 pages.
